member.name: M:KurirServer.Controllers.UsersController.GetUserByEmail(System.String)
member.summary: accepts email of user and check if ther is one in db, return true if there is not one, and false if it finds one

member.name: T:KurirServer.Helpers.SwaggerDefaultValues
member.summary: Represents the Swagger/Swashbuckle operation filter used to document the implicit API version parameter.
member.remarks: This is only required due to bugs in the . Once they are fixed and published, this class can be removed.

member.name: M:KurirServer.Helpers.SwaggerDefaultValues.Apply(Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.Swagger.Operation,Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.SwaggerGen.OperationFilterContext)
member.summary: Applies the filter to the specified operation using the given context.
member.param: The operation to apply the filter to.
